definition: have legs that curve outward at the knees, to discuss lightly
details:
adjective
- have legs that curve outward at the knees
= synonyms: bowed
verb
- to discuss lightly
= example: to discuss lightly
= synonyms: kick around
- to exchange blows
= example: to exchange blows
- to toss or strike a ball back and forth
= example: to toss or strike a ball back and forth
